summary: Fixed critical function initialization order error that was preventing spreadsheet component from loading. Moved populateSpreadsheetWithExaResults function declaration before its usage in handleSearchQuery and handleDirectQuery callbacks. Removed duplicate function definition. The ReferenceError has been resolved and the application should now load properly with working search functionality.
current_status: All major errors resolved. Mock search functionality is working with comprehensive debug logging. Ready for full testing of search and spreadsheet population features. Users can now test the Exa.ai search integration with proper error handling and debug visibility.
